  • Constructor Details

    • PlaytimeUser

      public PlaytimeUser(String uuid, String name, long time)
      Constructs a PlaytimeUser with the specified UUID, name, and playtime.
      Parameters:
      uuid - The UUID of the user.
      name - The name of the user.
      time - The initial playtime of the user in milliseconds.

    • PlaytimeUser

      public PlaytimeUser(String uuid, String name)
      Constructs a PlaytimeUser with the specified UUID and name. The initial playtime is set to 0.
      Parameters:
      uuid - The UUID of the user.
      name - The name of the user.

  • Method Details

    • loadUser

      public static CompletableFuture<PlaytimeUser> loadUser(UUID uuid)
      Loads a PlaytimeUser asynchronously based on the specified UUID.
      Parameters:
      uuid - The UUID of the user to load.
      Returns:
      A CompletableFuture that completes with the loaded PlaytimeUser.

    • updatePlaytime

      public void updatePlaytime()
      Updates the playtime of the user based on the time elapsed since the last check. Considers AFK status if configured not to count AFK time. Fires an AsyncPlaytimePlayerUpdatePlaytimeEvent asynchronously.

    • getUUID

      public UUID getUUID()
      Returns the UUID of the user.
      Returns:
      The UUID of the user.

    • addPlaytime

      public void addPlaytime(long time, TimeUnit timeUnit)
      Adds the specified amount of playtime to the user's total playtime.
      Parameters:
      time - The amount of time to add.
      timeUnit - The unit of time.

    • save

      public CompletableFuture<Boolean> save()
      Saves the user's playtime data asynchronously.
      Returns:
      A CompletableFuture that completes when the save operation is done.

    • removePlaytime

      public void removePlaytime(long time, TimeUnit timeUnit)
      Removes the specified amount of playtime from the user's total playtime.
      Parameters:
      time - The amount of time to remove.
      timeUnit - The unit of time.

    • setPlaytime

      public void setPlaytime(float time)
      Sets the user's total playtime to the specified value.
      Parameters:
      time - The new total playtime in milliseconds.

    • getBukkitPlayer

      public org.bukkit.entity.Player getBukkitPlayer()
      Returns the Bukkit Player object associated with the user.
      Returns:
      The Bukkit Player object.

    • translateTime

      public int[] translateTime()
      Translates the user's total playtime into an array of days, hours, minutes, and seconds.
      Returns:
      An array containing the days, hours, minutes, and seconds of playtime.

    • isAfk

      public boolean isAfk()
      Checks if the user is currently AFK
      Returns:
      true if the user is AFK, false otherwise

    • setAfk

      public void setAfk(boolean afk)
      Sets the user's AFK status
      Parameters:
      afk - The new AFK status

    • getAfkSince

      public long getAfkSince()
      Gets the timestamp when the user went AFK
      Returns:
      The timestamp when the user went AFK

    • setAfkSince

      public void setAfkSince(long afkSince)
      Sets the timestamp when the user went AFK
      Parameters:
      afkSince - The timestamp when the user went AFK

    • getAfkTime

      public float getAfkTime()
      Gets the total time the user has been AFK
      Returns:
      The total AFK time in milliseconds

    • addAfkTime

      public void addAfkTime(long time)
      Adds AFK time to the user's total AFK time
      Parameters:
      time - The time to add in milliseconds

    • getLastActivity

      public long getLastActivity()
      Gets the timestamp of the user's last activity
      Returns:
      The timestamp of the user's last activity

      public void setLastActivity(long lastActivity)
      Sets the timestamp of the user's last activity
      Parameters:
      lastActivity - The timestamp of the user's last activity

    • getActivePlaytime

      public float getActivePlaytime()
      Gets the user's active playtime (total playtime minus AFK time)
      Returns:
      The active playtime in milliseconds

    • translateActiveTime

      public int[] translateActiveTime()
      Translates the user's active playtime into an array of days, hours, minutes, and seconds.
      Returns:
      An array containing the days, hours, minutes, and seconds of active playtime.

    • translateAfkTime

      public int[] translateAfkTime()
      Translates the user's AFK time into an array of days, hours, minutes, and seconds.
      Returns:
      An array containing the days, hours, minutes, and seconds of AFK time.
